name: Simple Light - Tailwind CSS Landing Page Template
description:
Simple Light is a free landing page template built on top of TailwindCSS. Simple Light is designed to provide all the basic components a designer/developer need to create a landing page for SaaS products, online services, and more. 


Looking for the free coded versions?

- Simple Light React


Looking for more pages and components? Have a look at the premium version:

- Live demo
